name: Products and subscriptions
description: Control consumer access and enforce consistent usage rules using products, subscriptions, and groups.
topics: Products bundle APIs and define visibility and subscription requirements.
Subscriptions provide keys (and a unit of usage tracking) for quotas and rate limits.
Groups map to access control and approvals (often aligned with Azure AD groups).
nextSteps: Model products per consumer type (internal, partner, external) and align approval workflow.
Apply rate limit/quota policies at the product scope when consistent across APIs.
